explains: v. 滑动；使滑行（slide 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: sliding door n. 拉门；滑动门
sliding window 滑动窗；推拉窗
sliding contact 滑触；滑动触点
sliding scale 计算尺；按比例增减；浮动计算
sliding resistance 抗滑阻力，滑动阻力；滑线电阻
sliding part 滑动零件；滑动件

sentences.en: I still remember sliding down the banisters.
sentences.cn: 我仍能记起从楼梯扶手上滑下的事。

sentences.en: The company had to do something to reverse its sliding fortunes.
sentences.cn: 该公司不得不采取措施来逆转其下滑的运势。

sentences.en: Everything had to be strapped down to stop it from sliding around.
sentences.cn: 所有东西必须绑定，免得来回滑动。
